alg_conf:
RSPXSecExclFinState configuration [Rein-Seghal Model RES d^xsec / dQ^2 dW for the specified exclusive reaction] The actual Rein-Seghal model is coded at ReinSeghalPartialXSec. See also the RSPXSecSingleRes and RSPXSecResList
In this configuration parameter set we do not include the ambiguous P33(1600), F17(1970)
genie::RSPXSecSingleRes Default
P33(1232),S11(1535),D13(1520),S11(1650),D13(1700),D15(1675),S31(1620), D33(1700),P11(1440),P13(1720),F15(1680),P31(1910),P33(1920), F35(1905),F37(1950),P11(1710)
genie::RSPXSecSingleRes Default
P33(1232),S11(1535),D13(1520),S11(1650),D13(1700),D15(1675),S31(1620), D33(1700),P11(1440),P33(1600),P13(1720),F15(1680),P31(1910),P33(1920), F35(1905),F37(1950),P11(1710),F17(1970)
